sentences.en: But we found nearly half on them were mouldy. We can't accept them anyway.
sentences.cn: 但是我们发现差不多一半发了霉. 无论如何我们不能接受.

sentences.en: Corked taste , Corkiess, Corky . Taste imparted to bottled wines by defective or mouldy corks.
sentences.cn: 酒塞味:装瓶后的葡萄酒由于酒塞低劣或发霉变质而变上的味道.

sentences.en: Don't eat that! It's mouldy. It's gone off!
sentences.cn: 别吃那个！它已经发霉变质了！

sentences.en: Foods are easily to be mouldy in humid days.
sentences.cn: 潮湿的日子里,食物很容易发霉.

sentences.en: He found that the mouldy old haditation somewhat depressed his bride.
sentences.cn: 他却觉得,他这位新娘子,见了这所又老又旧的住宅,仿佛有点儿心情郁抑.

sentences.en: I always cover my licence with sticky-backed plastic, but even then it can turn mouldy and unreadable.
sentences.cn: 我总是在执照上贴一层塑膜，但即便如此它还是会发霉并致使没法辨认。

sentences.en: I've selected small mouldy room with a low ceiling in a hostel next to Yunlin's.
sentences.cn: 我看上一间又低,又小,又霉的的东房,这是在云霖的隔壁一家叫大元的公寓里.

sentences.en: If the sprouts smell, or taste, mouldy or acidic do not eat them.
sentences.cn: 如果甘蓝闻着或吃着有霉味或酸味，请勿食用。

sentences.en: Mouldy reason and mould - proof measure and mould - proof test are introduced in this paper.
sentences.cn: 介绍了纸及其制品的霉变原因,防霉措施和 防霉 效果检测方法.

sentences.en: Pretty mouldy pay increase this year.
sentences.cn: 我们今年的加薪少得可怜.

sentences.en: The grain has gone mouldy in the stack.
The newspapers grew mouldy on the tables.
This house has not been lived in for a long time, so It'smells mouldy.
sentences.cn: 这个屋子已经很久没人居住了, 散发着霉气.

sentences.en: We had a mouldy holiday it rained every day.
sentences.cn: 我们假日过得无聊极了--每天都下雨.
